title: Real-Time Health Data Access
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to access real-time health data for my clients so that I can monitor their well-being and respond promptly to any health issues.

title: Customizable User Profiles for Caregiver Access
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want customizable user profiles for each client so that I can efficiently track their individual health metrics and care plans in one accessible dashboard.

title: Secure Data Sharing Options with User Consent
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want secure data sharing options with user consent so that I can access necessary health information while respecting my clients' privacy preferences.

title: Streamlined Communication for Care Coordination
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want simplified communication channels with my clients so that I can efficiently manage their care and stay informed about their health status.

title: Integrated Alerts for Health Anomalies
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want to receive real-time alerts for any health anomalies so that I can take timely action and ensure the safety and well-being of my clients.

title: User-Friendly Interface for Health Monitoring
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want a user-friendly interface for health monitoring so that I can quickly track my clients' health metrics and respond to any alerts without navigating through complicated menus.

title: Training and Support Resources for Caregivers
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want access to training and support resources for using the ALFRED system so that I can efficiently monitor my clients' health and coordinate care without unnecessary delays or confusion.

title: Privacy Controls for User Health Data Access
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to manage the privacy settings for my clients' health data so that I can ensure their information is shared only with authorized family members and healthcare providers, respecting their preferences.

title: Health Metric Visualization for Quick Insights
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to quickly visualize the health metrics of my multiple clients in one dashboard so that I can efficiently monitor their well-being and respond to any critical changes promptly.

title: Personalized Care Task Notifications for Caregivers
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want to receive personalized notifications about critical health metrics and care tasks so that I can promptly respond to my clients' needs and ensure their well-being.
